description:
The 35th platoon investigates two cases: a mysterious love magic
artifact from a night club, and a sea monster at a beach where summer won`t end. Can they rack up the points they need for promotion?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai 35 Yoidore Shoutai / Crazy Summer Time
The 35th Drunken Platoon / Crazy Summer Time
第35酔いどれ小隊 / クレイジーサマータイム
